name: PowerReviews
headline: Integrate PowerReviews with your VTEX IO store.
overview: Integrate with PowerReviews to bring product ratings and reviews and other features to your VTEX IO store.
features: Display product ratings on the PDP and product shelves
Allow shoppers to read and filter reviews on the PDP
Allow shoppers to submit their own product ratings and reviews
Allow shoppers to ask and answer questions about products
